channel.title: Comments on: Rowing Upstream – Snapshots of Pioneers of the Information Age in Africa
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: John Daly
item.dc:creator: John Daly
item.description: I know quite a few of the authors of chapters or segments in this book, and they have been working to promote ICT in Africa for a long time! Have you tried an older book: "Bridge Builders - African Experiences with Information and Communication Technology"? http://www.nzdl.org/cgi-bin/library?e=d-000-00---0hdl--00-0-0-0prompt-10---4-0-1l--1-en-50---20-about---00001-001-1-0utfZz-8-0&a=d&c=hdl&cl=CL3.4&d=HASHab152d971526097536e60e
item.content:encoded: I know quite a few of the authors of chapters or segments in this book, and they have been working to promote ICT in Africa for a long time! Have you tried an older book: “Bridge Builders – African Experiences with Information and Communication Technology”? http://www.nzdl.org/cgi-bin/library?e=d-000-00—0hdl–00-0-0-0prompt-10—4-0-1l–1-en-50—20-about—00001-001-1-0utfZz-8-0&a=d&c=hdl&cl=CL3.4&d=HASHab152d971526097536e60e

item.title: By: American Idle
item.dc:creator: American Idle
item.description:
<strong>Upstream, downstream or bitstream</strong>
Rowing Upstream - Snapshots of Pioneers of the Information Age in Africa I came across a link to this book about ICT in Africa when surfing other blogs. The entire book seems to be online. It's got some really amazing...
item.content:encoded:
Upstream, downstream or bitstream

Rowing Upstream – Snapshots of Pioneers of the Information Age in Africa I came across a link to this book about ICT in Africa when surfing other blogs. The entire book seems to be online. It’s got some really amazing…
